data.system_settings: Samsung Galaxy S7 edge (SM-G935F), Android Nougat 7.0
data.expected_result: The app should take you back to the user profile.
data.short_description: Pressing the back button while in a server accessed from the Mutual Servers tab exits the app
data.steps_to_repro: - Ensure that you do not have the back button opens channel drawer option enabled in User Settings > Behavior - Go to the user profile of a friend that is in one or more servers you are a member of - Go to Mutual Servers - Press on one of the servers and wait for the app to open it - Press the back button on your mobile phone
